title: Travel Prism
description: A web application where a user can review any visited place and view others reviews.

title: Contact Management
description: A management back end application for keeping the track of contact details.Used REST API for CRUD operations.

title: chatGPT Discord bot
description: Made a custom discord bot using Node.js and discord.js which integrates chatGPT with discord server

title: Keep-A-Check
description: A web application which allows users to keep a track of their daily transactions and calculates the money inflow outflow.

title: Weather web app
description: A frontend web application which uses openweathermap api to get real time weather of any city across the world.
